name: get_task
description: Get detailed information about a single task by its ID from the in-memory task management system

function.name: get_task
function.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific task by its ID. Returns all task properties including title, description, parent relationship, status, and additional metadata like children count and hierarchy level.

task_id.description: The unique ID (UUID) of the task to retrieve. Must be a valid existing task ID.

include_children.description: Whether to include information about child tasks. If true, returns a list of direct children with their basic information.

include_parent_chain.description: Whether to include the full parent chain from root to this task. If true, returns an array of parent tasks from root to immediate parent.

response_format.description: Returns a JSON object with 'success' (boolean), 'timestamp' (ISO string), 'tool_name' (string), and 'task' (detailed task object). The task object includes id, title, description, parent, status, and optional children/parent_chain arrays based on parameters. Error responses include 'error' field with detailed error message for non-existent tasks.
